<br>

I’m Kostadin Kostadinov, a medical doctor, senior assistant professor, and researcher in the Department of Social Medicine and Public Health, Plovdiv, Bulgaria. I hold an MD (MU–Plovdiv), an MPH (MU–Plovdiv), and MSc in Economics and Finance (Sofia University). I am also a graduate (MBA) of the D. A. Tsenov Academy of Economics in Svishtov (statistics). I am currently pursuing a master’s in Policy Analysis (Sofia University). I hold a PhD and a medical specialty in Social Medicine, and I am currently a fellow in Epidemiology. My interests include data science, policy evaluation, and health services research. This website is a collection of my thoughts, teaching materials, and research projects. The expressed opinions are my own and do not represent the views of any institution.
